summary: 8.5 years of IT experience in Java/J2EE technologies. Currently Technical Designer at Tata Consultancy Services. Proficient in designing, coding and unit testing with Spring 3, jQuery, Bootstrap, JPA, Struts, Core Java, JSP, EJB, XML, and PLSQL. Sun Certified Java Programmer 1.6. Hands-on experience in Agile development, OO methodology and design patterns, and web services. Exposure to automation in building solutions. Seeking opportunities for growth in a dynamic environment.

experience.title: Technical Designer
experience.description: Involved in designing, coding and unit testing using Java/J2EE technologies (Spring 3, jQuery, Bootstrap, JPA, Struts, Core Java, JSP, EJB, XML, PLSQL). Exposed to web services and automation; works in an Agile environment. Utilizes Eclipse, Confluence UML, Git, Rally and Confluence for collaboration and version control. Previously contributed to FedEx FXO project activities and solution design.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: FXO (FedEx Office) project for client FedEx. Technologies include Java 6.0, Web Services, Hibernate, EJB, XML. Roles included analysis & design discussions, requirement gathering, Struts coding, bug fixing, unit testing. Tools: Subversion, Eclipse. Database: MySQL. Servers: JBOSS.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: iCon3 tool development: Java 6.0, Hibernate, Struts, UML, Niagara AX, XML. End-to-end BMS tool development including estimation, engineering, commissioning and service modules. Roles included analysis & design, requirement gathering, weekly track meetings, prototypes, Axis with JBOSS integration, unit testing. SEI environment. Tools: Git, Eclipse, Rally, UML, Confluence. Database: Oracle 11i. Servers: WebLogic 10.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Computer Science & Engg
